body:
Comment 6: 
The change doesn't fix it.  Here's the goray tarball. Be warned that I hacked it
together this morning; don't give it a -j flag.  To build and run the failing test:

tar xzf goray-r156.tar.gz
cd goray
goinstall goyaml.googlecode.com/hg/token
goinstall goyaml.googlecode.com/hg/scanner
goinstall goyaml.googlecode.com/hg/parser
goinstall goyaml.googlecode.com/hg/data
make
./goray demos/suzanne.yaml
Attachments: 1. goray-r156.tar.gz (140289 bytes)
